select assets_items.id, assets_items.item_name, assets_items.item_type, assets_items.item_format,assets_items.is_write_off,assets_items.is_modify,assets_items.batch_num, assets_items.supplier_name, assets_items.post_sale_phone, assets_items.installed_time, assets_items.warranty_time, assets_items.item_location,assets_items.item_ip, assets_items.item_admin, assets_items.item_state, assets_items.remarks, assets_items.item_belonger, assets_items.create_time,sys_dept.dept_name from assets_items,sys_dept where assets_items.item_belonger=sys_dept.dept_id
